trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all Panel elements.
trans-unit.target: 모든 Panel 요소에 대 한 기본 클래스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use Panel elements to position and arrange child objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: 패널의 요소를 사용 하 여 배치 및 자식 개체에 정렬할 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 응용 프로그램입니다.

trans-unit.source: A Panel contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, which are in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 포함 하는 패널 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>에 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child to a Panel implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> for the Panel element.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>패널에 자식이 암시적으로 추가 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>패널 요소에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a comprehensive suite of derived Panel implementations, enabling many complex layouts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]여러 가지 복잡 한 레이아웃을 사용 하도록 설정 하는 파생 된 패널 구현 종합적인을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to implement new layout containers, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 새 레이아웃 컨테이너를 구현 하려는 경우 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a demonstration of how to use these methods, see [Create a Custom Content-Wrapping Panel Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979).
trans-unit.target: 이러한 메서드를 사용 하는 방법의 데모를 보려면 참조 [래핑 사용자 지정 콘텐츠 패널 만들기 샘플](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Panel elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A> is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Panel 요소 경우 마우스 또는 스타일러스 이벤트를 수신 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A>정의 되어 있지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your Panel, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 핸들 마우스 또는 스타일러스 해야 할 패널에 대 한 배경 원하지 않는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A> 를 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: Panel elements do not receive focus by default.
trans-unit.target: Panel 요소 기본적으로 포커스를 받지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 포커스를 받을 패널 요소를, 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that is used to fill the area between the borders of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> 의 테두리 사이의 영역을 채우는 데 사용 되는 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a Background is not defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>요소는 백그라운드 정의 되지 않은 경우 마우스 또는 스타일러스 이벤트를 받지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 핸들 마우스 또는 스타일러스에 필요 하지만 위한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A> 사용</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 에 대 한 배경 원하지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref> of child elements of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref> 이 자식 요소의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Children collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 자식 컬렉션을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>요소만 포함할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>개체.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>에 자식은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>암시적으로 추가 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>요소.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this collection with derived <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> classes; use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션을 사용 하지 마십시오 파생 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>클래스, 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A>컬렉션 대신.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> is data bound.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 반환 `null` 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>데이터 바인딩된.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the generated <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> to cache information about child elements or to perform incremental layout updates.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 생성 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>증분 레이아웃 업데이트를 수행 하는 또는 자식 요소에 대 한 정보를 캐시에.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: The logical parent element of the collection to be created.
trans-unit.target: 만들 컬렉션의 논리적 부모 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: An ordered collection of elements that have the specified logical parent.
trans-unit.target: 순서가 지정 된 컬렉션은 지정 된 논리 부모가 있는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 의 자식 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 지정한 인덱스 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스 위치는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 자식입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 부모의 자식인 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> property for a given element.
trans-unit.target: 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>지정된 된 요소에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The element for which to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> value.
trans-unit.target: 요소를 검색할는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>값.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> position of the element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>요소의 위치입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The element is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 요소는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> arranges its descendants in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부이 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 단일 차원에 해당 하위 항목을 정렬 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Among predefined panel elements, only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> returns `true`, because its orientation is in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 간에 미리 정의 된 panel 요소만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>반환 `true`단일 차원에 정의 된,.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> can override this property.
trans-unit.target: 서브 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>이 속성을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is in one dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우의 방향을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 하나의 차원;에 이렇게 하지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> arranges its descendants in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부이 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 단일 차원에 해당 하위 항목을 정렬 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Among predefined panel elements, only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> returns `true`, because its orientation is in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 간에 미리 정의 된 panel 요소만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>반환 `true`단일 차원에 정의 된,.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is in one dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우의 방향을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 하나의 차원;에 이렇게 하지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref> of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref> 자식 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned collection includes items that are added directly in code, and also items that are generated by data binding.
trans-unit.target: 반환된 된 컬렉션에는 코드에 직접 추가 되는 항목 및 데이터 바인딩에 의해 생성 된 항목에 포함 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> should use this property, instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property, for internal overrides such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>이 속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>등 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> 내부 재정의 위한 속성을</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> 대신 사용 해야</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 하는에서 파생 된 클래스

trans-unit.source: An ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 정렬된 된 컬렉션 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 기본값이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is a container for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] items that are generated by an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 에 대 한 컨테이너는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 하 여 생성 된 항목에는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: You cannot bind data to this property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 데이터를 바인딩할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is an items host; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 기본값이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the panel, if the panel supports layout in only a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> 패널 지원&1; 차원에서 레이아웃 패널의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> 패널의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 기본값이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the panel, if the panel supports layout in only a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> 패널 지원&1; 차원에서 레이아웃 패널의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A> is `false`, this property value should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>은 `false`,이 속성 값은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> 패널의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 기본값이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*>속성 값이 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*>

trans-unit.source: The old property value.
trans-unit.target: 이전 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The new property value.
trans-unit.target: 새 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object during the render pass of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠를 그립니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> 렌더링 단계 중에 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> 그릴 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"></xref> of a visual object is modified.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출 되는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"> </xref> 시각적 개체의 수정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> values are automatically recalculated when child elements are added to or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>값은 자식 요소가 추가 되거나 컬렉션에서 제거할 때 자동으로 다시 계산 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 컬렉션에 추가 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that was removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 하는 컬렉션에서 제거 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> attached property for a given element.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>연결 된 지정된 된 요소에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground.
trans-unit.target: 더 큰는 `value` 의 주어진 `element`가능성이 높습니다는 `element` 전경에 표시 하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로, 하는 경우는 `element` 에 상대적으로 낮은 `value`, `element` 백그라운드에서 나타날 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 `element` 있는 `value` 5 보다 위에 표시 되는 `element` 있는 `value` 4 보다 위에 표시 되는 `element` 3, 및 등의 값이 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern.
trans-unit.target: 음수 값 허용 여부와이 선행 패턴을 계속 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Members of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection that have equal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>동일한 컬렉션 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>값은 시각적 트리에 나타나는 순서 대로 렌더링 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 멤버를 반복 하 여 자식의 인덱스 위치를 확인할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to apply the property value.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값을 적용할 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The order on the z-plane in which this element appears.
trans-unit.target: 이 요소가 표시 되는 z 평면의 순서입니다.

trans-unit.source: The element is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 요소는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*> collection of a panel should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 결정 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*>패널의 컬렉션을 serialize 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*> collection should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*> collection is only serialized if it is not empty and not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <> </> *> 고, 그렇지 않으면 직렬화 된 컬렉션 해야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다. <> </> *> 컬렉션은 비어 있지 않으면 serialize만 아닌 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버 지원는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 자식으로 추가 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버 지원는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 개체에 추가 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects in this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 자식 수를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 개체의이 인스턴스에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 자식 수가 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>연결 된 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
